2006690.name: Kingdom's Edge
2006690.description:
Core Gameplay

EXPLORE a vertical world filled with Monsters, Puzzles, Treasures... and beautiful landscapes.
A MULTIPLAYER adventure with sessions of 3 players (friends or not). You can also play SOLO and LAN.

FIGHT against monsters with different ABILITIES and CLASSES, allowing COMBOS and TEAM BUILDING ACTIONS.

SEARCH for hidden roads, pieces of art, magic weapons, blueprints for new technologies.
BUILD your domain in the city of Qrizon with the thing you've added to your INVENTORY during your travel.
VISIT the domain of your friends and make decoration contest between you!

DIVE DEEP into the LORE of the depth, the character's story and this strange Organization trying to make money on your discoveries...



Slash and Heroes

You play with a top-down free camera. Equip your hero with two weapons.
The heroes have 4 abilities, with can be combined to make different combos. As the game is a multiplayer co-op, this allows you to build a team that can complete its self. For example, one deals looped indirect damage, while another hero gain a bit a life each time a monster is damage and so on...
The weapons can be upgraded according to your favorite type of gameplay with the forge.
Your friends can drop you their weapon, this means that you can go really fast if you want or chose the more pure way !

Play with Friends

The games play in solo or in session. Invite up to 2 other steam players. Fight monsters and discover treasures together. You will be able to visit other player's domain. The progress made in any session is saved and loaded between each session.
The puzzles also adapt to the number of player and can be more sophisticated..


Domains, Build and Visit them

Domain are rest places where you can build houses, technologies building and decorate.
The domains are fields placed along the city of Qrizon.
Tech buildings give you access to new gameplay features such as tech tree for the research tower, quest and table games for the tavern, merging and crafting weapons for the forge.. etc
Decorations can be foud in the depth. You´re running around an find them in the map. Grab them and the place them in your domain. There is a large range from wind mill, ruins to vegetation... The citizen (NPC) can pay to visit your domain, so try to make it as beautyfull as possible, so you'll be REACH! mwahaha


Building was wrong placed or you have´nt enough place left for the decoration? No stress, you can move, rotate, stock or destroy them!
Your domain is saved between the session.. it just spawn randomly on one of the 3 plots each time you join a session.


Puzzles and Treasures

The game has a huge exploration part. Basically, you're here to grab as much stuff as you can from this strange world.. Did I told you that there was in case an Incorporation trying to make a lot of money on your discoveries? no? Play it you'll see!
However, puzzles will be on your road, press buttons, move blocks, be fast.. They adapt to the number of player to be more challenging
Hidden roads can lead to very good loot: Blueprints, weapons, decorations, relics.. Try to get them all!

About Galtouz Games

Hey i'm Tamwyn, Solo game dev, currently a physics student, but I'm trying as much as I can to push this project as far as possible, really!
If you liked it, consider wishlist it, you can join the adventure with the discord/youtube link on the right ^^
